titles.title: New factorization relations for nonlinear sigma model amplitudes

affiliations.value: Niels Bohr International Academy and Discovery Center Niels Bohr Insitute, University of Copenhagen Blegdamsvej 17, DK-2100 Copenhagen Ø, Denmark

copyright.statement: Published by the American Physical Society

abstracts.value: We obtain novel factorization identities for nonlinear sigma model amplitudes using a new integrand in the Cachazo-He-Yuan double-cover prescription. We find that it is possible to write very compact relations using only longitudinal degrees of freedom. We discuss implications for on shell recursion.
